com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options

Class Legend

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options.Legend

  • public class Legend
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    An object with members to configure various aspects of the legend.

      • setAligment

        public final void setAligment(LegendAlignment alignment)
        Sets alignment of the legend.
        The default value depends on the legend's position. For BOTTOM legends, the default is CENTER; other legends default to START.
        Parameters:
        alignment -

      • setMaxLines

        public final void setMaxLines(int maxLines)
        Maximum number of lines in the legend. Set this to a number greater than one to add lines to your legend. Note: The exact logic used to determine the actual number of lines rendered is still in flux.
        This option currently works only when position is TOP.
        Parameters:
        maxLines - default is 1

      • setPosition

        public final void setPosition(LegendPosition position)
        Sets the position of the legend.
        Parameters:
        position - default is RIGHT

      • setTextStyle

        public final void setTextStyle(TextStyle textStyle)
        Specifies the legend text style.
        Parameters:
        textStyle -
